section_summary: The text discusses three reports from relevant regulatory bodies. The first report is from the Budget and Final Account Committee, which includes two projects: one regarding the adoption of the final account of the National Assembly for the fiscal year 2016/2015, and another regarding the budget of the National Assembly for the fiscal year 2018/2017. The second report is also from the Budget and Final Account Committee, which includes a project regarding the adoption of the final account of the General Administration of Firefighting for the fiscal year 2016/2015, and another regarding the budget of the General Administration of Firefighting for the fiscal year 2017/2018. The third report is from the Budget and Final Account Committee as well, which includes a project regarding the establishment of the final account of the General Authority for the Care of Printing and Publishing the Quran and Sunnah for the fiscal year 2015/2016.
questions_this_excerpt_can_answer:
1. ما هي المشاريع المدرجة في التقرير الأول من لجنة الميزانيات والحساب الختامي؟
2. ما هي المشاريع المدرجة في التقرير الثاني من لجنة الميزانيات والحساب الختامي؟
3. ما هي المشاريع المدرجة في التقرير الثالث من لجنة الميزانيات والحساب الختامي؟
